name: ultra-ball
effect: Used in battle : Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 2×. If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 2×.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A better BALL with a higher catch rate than a GREAT BALL.
flavor_text.emerald: A better BALL with a higher catch rate than a GREAT BALL.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A very high-grade BALL that offers a higher POKéMON catch rate than a GREAT BALL.
